name: Pointa!
description:
"Pointa!" is a board game which is simple to enjoy. Meanwhile you can also play the game with pen and paper, the "Pointa!" software is meant to implement the original board game in python and is an open-source software with MIT license which you can find the code repository here.

The Game Instructions ...

You can find game instructions with multiple languages here. (We strongly recommend you that read the game instruction first, at least have a glancing of it before you go into games.)

More Information ...

Check out the code repository here!

Server ...

To play with your friend, you might need a server (which is required to input every time you play the game) the official server runs the latest server version is

http://182.92.116.130:5000

Just type it at the beginning of the game! Or you have just hosted a new server, feel free to leave a comment about this!
